diagnoses: explanation:Kawasaki disease is a rare condition that primarily affects children under 5. Symptoms include fever

explanation:Scarlet fever is a bacterial infection that can cause fever
and swelling of the tongue. In some cases it may also lead to swelling in the hands and feet.}
explanation:Measles is a viral infection that causes fever
and a red rash. Koplik spots in the mouth and swelling of hands and feet can also occur.}
explanation:Erythema multiforme is a skin disorder that can cause fever
and swollen lips. In severe cases
lesions can also develop in the mouth and throat.}

explanation:Strep throat is a bacterial throat infection that causes sore throat
